modules.description: Transforms recursive module expressions into non-recursive struct forms by rewriting the module signature and implementation. Operates on module type declarations and functor arguments to eliminate recursion. Enables safe use of recursive modules in contexts where direct recursion is disallowed.

Generates recursive functions for variant types with custom constructors and associated data. Operates on OCaml's type expressions and includes support for polymorphic variants. Enables automated creation of deep equality checks and pretty-printers for complex data structures.
